entries.boss_detected: Our sensors are picking up the ship signature of Black Sun captain, get ready!
entries.complete: Amazing! The Black Sun will not forget this day! Return to base and rest up, you did good today pilot.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_1: You fool! Standing up to the Black Sun is suicide!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_2: You're no match for my skill Rebel!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_3: Pathetic worm, prepare to face my wrath!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_4: The Black Sun will crush you and your pathetic Nym friends!
entries.dd_boss_taunt_5: I'm your worst nightmare Rebel and there's no waking up from this one!
entries.found_loc: Alright we are tracking more Black Sun fighters in this area. Give 'em hell!
entries.level_boss: The stinking Black Sun is responding to the attacks by sending %TO, one of their captains.
entries.level_boss_dead: Whow! %TO has been a thorn in our side for a long time, great job!
entries.level_increase: The Black Sun are waking up, you'll find that they will send tougher pilots in response to your attacks.
entries.quest_destroy_d: Proceed with terminating Black Sun scum. We will update your navigation computer with new coordinates of where they have been spotted.
entries.quest_location_d: You're an experienced pilot, and the Dantooine system shouldn't pose a big threat, but don't relax too much, the sneaky Black Sun are sure to have some surprises.
entries.targets_behind: Tactical Computer: < Be aware, vessels trying to target this ship with their weapon systems. Attack originating direction 180 degrees. >
entries.targets_detected: Tactical Computer: < Vessels fitting hunted ship profile on attack vector, weapon systems armed. >
entries.taunt_2: You Rebel fools will wish you never messed with the Black Sun!
entries.taunt_4: I got you in my sights scum, there's no escape!
entries.taunt_5: I'm getting closer, the next bolt will fry your engine and then it's all over!
entries.title: Dantooine system: Duty mission: Strike a blow to the Black Sun.
entries.title_d: The Black Sun is taking more and more liberties against us. Let's teach them a lesson by launching guerilla attacks against their fighters. When you feel that you have exhausted your ship, yourself, or that you have enough experience to continue your training, you can return to base at any time.
